description:
Something terrible has happened to Matsugo: he`s turned into an angel! Worse, he`s HELPING people! Later, Sakura and Ichigo bump into Shoma as he tries to help a hippo spirit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les ailes du bonheur / Hippo-kichi / La plainte de la cassette
Shukufuku no Hane / Kabakichi-kun / Cassette Tape no Himei
Wings of Celebration / Kabakichi-kun / Scream of a Cassette Tape
祝福の羽 / カバ吉くん / カセットテープの悲鳴
